DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether mental health treatment disengagement may mitigate reduce barrier self-management enhance self-management skill .
DOC.brief_title: Electronic Self-management Resource Training Mental Health
DOC.detailed_description: Each year , four million young adult ( age 18-25 year old ) U.S. receive psychotropic medication psychotherapy treatment mental illness . One every four young adult disengage mental health treatment significant symptom remission achieve . Mental health treatment disengagement may mitigate reduce barrier self-management enhance self-management skill . Electronic self-management resource training mental health ( eSMART-MH ) innovative use avatars−virtual person tailor response users−to improve mental health treatment disengagement .
DOC.criteria: Selfreport diagnosis depression generalize anxiety disorder great six month Young adult 1825 year age Prescribed psychotropic medication and/or psychotherapy Have document domestic telephone number Able read understand English Participation eSMARTHD parent project
